column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I have been here a few times and have loved it every single time. Even on the worst day to go when it was raining and the streets were flooding
column2: the restaurant was still popping. We came in drenched and the hosts offered up paper towels to dry us off. The wait is usually 30-45 min long for 2 people.. Thats pretty much the only downside.
